title: Electric power - power delivered to resistor

content.question: Which of the following expressions correctly represents the power dissipated by the resistor with resistance <math alttext="2 R" overflow="scroll"> <mn>2</mn> <mi>R</mi> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator script uppercase E squared, and denominator R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="one half times the fraction with numerator script uppercase E squared, and denominator R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="one fourth times the fraction with numerator script uppercase E squared, and denominator R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="one eighth times the fraction with numerator script uppercase E squared, and denominator R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one eighth times the fraction with numerator script uppercase E squared, and denominator R" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>8</mn></mfrac><mfrac><msup><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi>R</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
